tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am feeling profound honoured and proud to write about very senior and highly learned Dr.RaviKumar Mukartihal who is not only wonderful and excellent  Orthopedic and Robotic surgeon but also a great human being which I experienced in my first ever examination of both knee problems. He explained everything to me in a very clear manner. He was also very kind and friendly. Due to his great expertise and experience in Robotic knee surgery and looking to his mighty confidence in me I got ready for bilateral Total knee replacement on 23rdJuly 2022. During my hospital stay he was so cooperative and helping nature attitude. Resultantly I am able to recover so fast even within 12days of surgery I am able to walk without any Walker/stick or any support.At the time of stitch removal On 14thday I entered into hospital on foot even without any support. All hospital staff surprised to see my fast recovery. All credit goes to Dr Ravi who always inspired me with smiling face during stay in hospital and showed great confidence in me that I would recover very fast.Even after discharge from hospital he is kind enough to reply my each and every WhatsApp messages so quickly with building up a great satisfaction of my all querry.
Dr. Ravi is incredible. Not only has he taken great care of my health, but also he is lovely to speak with at every appointment. It‚Äôs rare to find a doctor that combines such personal touches and care for a patient as a person with outstanding quality of medical care. Hence I came all the way from Jaipur Rajasthan to Bengalore for TKR at very reasonable cost .I highly recommend becoming his patient!

Great medical office, wonderful and warm experience from start to finish. Appreciate Dr.Ravi taking time to go over the diagnosis clearly and treatment options.

Wonderful experience with Sparsh hospital Bengalore where Dr. Ravi is a wonderful surgeon, and the staff was always helpful and kind. They ensured I had a smooth prep, surgery, and follow-up. I am so glad and lucky that I chosen Dr Ravi for TKR and would highly recommend to anyone. I started to walk daily on an average 4 to 5km with out any problem within two months of TKR. Once you meet personally you started to love him as a great Doctor at the same time wonderful cooperative human being.
I highly recommend Dr RaviKumar Murkatihal, Bengalore for TKR and even for any ortho problem also.
Nathmal Jain,
Rajasthan
(Retd AGM, SBI)

.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had taken my father for consultaion to get his femur and hip checked where he had undergone  surgery already which did not prove to be effective. Although we had taken multiple opinions on what should be the best solution, it was a blessing to have met Dr.Ravi Kumar as he gave us the best advise and did not push us to take a decision in a hurry. The best quality doctor was that he also took an opinion from his senior doctor Dr.Sharan Patil to give us the confidence on the procedures planned. He also performed the surgery and shared the up to date updates on my father's condition. Very happy with his service.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had a fall this July at SPARSH  Infantry Road & was.under consultation Of Dr Ravi Kumar Mukartihal & team.

I was going through a great deal of pain.He explained my condition & what to expect.Dr Ravi's great attention to detail, willingness to lend an ear to patients fear, troubles & never ending zeal to map out a road to recovery is something that definitely stuck with me through the course of my treatment. 

My experience with Doctor was great.I felt compassion & care from all involved. I'M anxious about this,but I know the outcome will bring back a quality of life.I truly felt  like I was in trustworthy & exceptional hands.
What A Wonderful Team Of Professionals......üòä
A Big Thankyou To All Those Involved.....üôå
I highly recommendDr Ravi Kumar Mukartihal & Team at Sparsh Infantry Road to those with Orthopedic Needs.üôèüòä

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Excellent explanation of steps to be taken for recovery. He was patient and answered all my questions. He also ensured his colleague came to address a skin infection issue and he returned again to check if the skin doc had addressed my problem. I strongly recommend this doctor. He has the right skillset. Great job, Dr Ravikumar M. Keep it up.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We have interacted with Dr Ravi Kumar during our daughter's surgery which was done by him. He was extremely friendly and kept us well informed about the treatment and during the whole of her hospitalization. He made us feel tension free and comfortable. This was one of the main reasons why I opted to see him for my back pain problem.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Drs are exallent nursus all so good only billing section & reciptoin not up to mark . Room staff good
reply_text:

We will  fix that also
